summary:
USER_CONTEXT: Fix FITSDiff class incorrectly reporting differences when comparing identical FITS files with VLA (variable-length array) columns

TASK_TRACKING:
COMPLETED: 
- Analyzed problem: FITSDiff reports false differences for VLA columns (format 'QD') even when comparing file to itself
- Located astropy source repository structure
- Found pre-built astropy 7.1.0 available in micromamba environment
- Tested reproduction case with astropy 7.1.0 - bug does NOT reproduce (shows "identical: True")
- Located relevant files: /astropy/io/fits/diff.py contains FITSDiff implementation

PENDING: 
- Examine FITSDiff class implementation in diff.py
- Search for VLA-specific comparison logic
- Identify what fix was applied between versions 5.2.1 and 7.1.0
- Verify the fix is properly implemented
- Create test case to prevent regression

CURRENT_STATE: Bug appears fixed in astropy 7.1.0, need to analyze the fix implementation

CODE_STATE: 
- Repository: /tmp/tmp1_6k5dg_/astropy/
- Key file: astropy/io/fits/diff.py (FITSDiff class)
- Test environment: micromamba python with astropy 7.1.0

TESTS: Reproduction test passes (no false differences reported)

VERSION_CONTROL_STATUS: Working with astropy source repository, bug fixed in current version
